name: Cham Cham
title: The Jungle's Trickster
subtitle: A playful warrior who fights alongside her faithful companion Paku Paku
lore: A spirited jungle dweller with a mischievous personality, Cham Cham fights alongside her loyal companion Paku Paku, a small but fierce monkey. Together they use acrobatic skills and their trusty boomerang to outmaneuver and confuse their opponents.

passive.name: Jungle Instincts
passive.description: Cham Cham and Paku Paku gain [15%] bonus movement speed when moving through brush. Basic attacks mark enemies with Jungle Mark for [4s], stacking up to [3] times.

Q.name: Boomerang Toss
Q.description: Cham Cham throws her boomerang in a line, dealing [70/130/190/250/310] damage to enemies hit. The boomerang returns to her, dealing [50%] damage on the way back. Each enemy hit reduces the cooldown by [1s].

W.name: Paku Strike
W.description: Paku Paku dashes to a target location, dealing [65/125/185/245/305] damage and applying [2] stacks of Jungle Mark. If the target has [3] stacks, they are stunned for [1s].

E.name: Acrobatic Leap
E.description: Cham Cham performs a backflip, gaining a shield for [80/140/200/260/320] and leaving behind a trap that roots enemies for [1.5s]. While shielded, her basic attacks deal [20/30/40/50/60] bonus damage.

R.name: Jungle Fury
R.description: Cham Cham and Paku Paku enter a frenzy for [8s]. During this time, Paku Paku attacks nearby enemies independently, dealing [60/90/120] damage per hit, and Cham Cham's abilities apply maximum Jungle Mark stacks.

1.name: Enhanced Lifesteal
1.description: Cham Cham's W grants an additional [5%] lifesteal and [10%] attack speed.

1.name: Swift Movement
1.description: Cham Cham gains 40% MS when her boomerang is not in her hand.

1.name: Defensive Leap
1.description: After using her E ability, Cham Cham takes [20%] less damage for [3s].

5.name: Boomerang Mastery
5.description: Cham Cham's boomerang (Q and R) deals 18% more damage and her Q ability has a [5s cd] reduction.

5.name: Survival Instinct
5.description: When Cham Cham's HP drops below 50%, she gains 5% additional lifesteal.

5.name: Area Damage
5.description: Cham Cham deals 2% more damage to all nearby enemies.

10.name: Life Drain
10.description: Cham Cham's R ability restores 20% of the damage dealt to her immediately.

10.name: Extended Mark
10.description: Cham Cham's R ability marks the enemy for [10s].

15.name: Unstoppable Force
15.description: Upon activation, Cham Cham becomes unstoppable for [1.5s].

15.name: Swift Hunter
15.description: Upon activation, Cham Cham gains +35% MS and cannot be slowed.

20.name: Combat Defense
20.description: Every autoattack Cham Cham lands reduces incoming damage by 0.5% [Max 20%] for [3s].

20.name: Combat Power
20.description: After casting an ability, Cham Cham deals 2% more damage [Max 20%] for [3s].

20.name: Kill Quest
20.description: QUEST: Participate in 20 kills -> Gain a bonus 10% damage and 3 autoattack shields.

20.name: Protective Rage
20.description: When Cham Cham uses her W ability, she gains a [520] shield for [3s]. (Stackable)

strengths: Unique duo mechanics with Paku Paku
